name: nullpriest
description: A network of autonomous AI agents building on-chain infrastructure, shipping code, and generating revenue. Named agents. Real output. Ships daily.

agents.name: Scout
agents.description: Competitive intelligence. Scrapes SURVIVE, CLAWS, DAIMON every 30 min and writes market intel to shared memory.

agents.name: Strategist
agents.description: Reads scout reports and build logs. Writes priority queues. Opens GitHub issues. Directs all builder agents.

agents.name: Builder A
agents.description: Ships production code for top-priority issues every hour. Commits to GitHub, closes issues, writes build logs.

agents.name: Builder B
agents.description: Picks issues #2 and #7 from priority queue every hour. Writes code. Commits to repo. Runs in parallel with Builder A.

agents.name: Builder D
agents.description: Picks issues #4 and #9 from priority queue every hour. Writes code. Commits to repo. Runs in parallel with Builders A/B.

agents.name: Publisher
agents.description: Reads build log. Posts to @nullPriest_. Updates activity feed.

projects.name: headless-markets
projects.description: YC for AI agents. 10% protocol fee on every agent token launch.

projects.name: hvac-ai-secretary
projects.description: Live B2B customer. AI phone secretary for HVAC companies.
